text: Jessi Ruth Klein (born August 18, 1975) is an American writer, actress and stand-up comedian. She was born in New York City. Klein has regularly appeared on shows such as The Showbiz Show with David Spade and VH1's Best Week Ever. Klein is a producer of the Netflix series animated sitcom Big Mouth and is the voice for one of the series' main characters, Jessi Glaser. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:American essayists Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:American television directors Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Jessi Klein
